title: Fallout 4 will support the PlayStation Vita Remote Play feature on PS4 - Gaming
text: Fallout 4 players on PlayStation 4 will have access to more than one control method.The PS4 version of Bethesda's upcoming role-playing game will support the PlayStation Vita Remote Play feature.#Fallout4 on Vita Remote Play. Great controls thanks to control-freak @Josh_Hamrick, who helped create Destiny's. pic.twitter.com/B1ohC68ihjâ€” BethesdaGameStudios (@BethesdaStudios) October 14, 2015The handheld offers 'great' controls via this method, which was made possible in part by designer Josh Hamrick - who also helped make the feature compatible with Bungie's Destiny.Bethesda recently unveiled a brand-new trailer for Fallout 4, giving fans a look at its Agility system that they'll need to ensure their survival.Set in a post-apocalyptic Boston, the game is the first new entry in the role-playing series since 2010's New Vegas.Fallout 4 is set to make its worldwide debut on November 10 for PS4, Xbox One and PC.Everything you need to know about Fallout 4, including release date, trailers and pre-ordersCheck out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel.
